data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kurz, Michael (2015): On the systematic position of Electrocrania Kusnezov, 1941 with the description of a new species from Baltic amber (Lepidoptera: Micropterigidae). Zootaxa 4044 (3): 446-450, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4044.3.7
